channel.title: C# on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in C# on Küse's Codes

item.title: Bolero hosting Razor page
item.description: In this post we investigate how to use Razor pages on the host and Bolero WebAssembly on the client side. The final code can be found on My github - Tutorials - BoleroAppRazor.

item.title: Bibliographies, citations and dotnet programming
item.description: Helping out a friend to get a Matura thesis completed, I stumbled onto the topics of citations and bibliographies. In the end, I wanted to get a handle on bibliographies using dotnet code.
